The English Introduction
====================================
This is a traditional Chinese version of the newest Windows 7(Windows 7 x86 build 7106)
The full name is:7106.0.090418-1330_x86fre_client_zh-tw_Retail_Ultimate-GRC1CULFRER_CHT_DVD.iso

This is NOT an official version. It's made by MICRO-Duo(http://www.microduo.tsk.tw). Because of that, the name of the File is different from the official version. Don't worry, you all, we have just added our language pack and translated the install interface. We can guarantee that we made it all from the  official version and tested all fine.

Our purpose is to make the Windows 7 more easier to use for the Chinese.
